ygData.subject: Thinking about which-- grouping
ygData.msgSnippet: Thinking about which-- are there any in Characters on the Drinal server that know dungeons well? I know very little about dungeons and have been killing at the
ygData.messageBody:
Thinking about which-- are there any in
Characters on the Drinal server that know dungeons well? I
know very little about dungeons and have been killing
at the Aviaks. Loot there is good but looking for
good items and exp that drop in dungeons now.
<br><br>I'm a level 23 druid that gets most play in on Tues
and Thurs about 4 or 5 pm to 10pm at night. That's
CST since I'm in Texas.<br><br>shooman
out<br><br>PS... CST.. Chapter Story Teller. There's my LARPer
side popping out again. Grin.<br><br>Fatedhue
Prismatic, Drinal Server of the 23rd-- looking forward to
level 24 spells.<br><br>PPS... sorry EQrogue. Would
love to group with the backstabbing vixen female
rogues that are around. =) But yes... on Drinal. =/
<br><br>PPPS EQ and flirting. Evilly addicting. I had a poor
girl asking me if I were a female or a man once
though. I play a male wood elf. Sadly enough, I was
flattered. Usually ppl just ask me if I'm gay. LOL. My
answer to them is -- what wood elf isn't of the merriest
of spirit when prowling through the forest
prismatic???
